id.description: Unique ID of this skill to reference it with Papyrus functions

level.description: Global variable that contains the current skill level

ratio.description: Global variable that contains progress to the next level (between 0 and 1)

legendary.description: Optional global variable that contains the count of how many times the skill has been made legendary

color.description: Optional global variable that contains the RGB color of the skill (white: 0xFFFFFF; red: 0xFF0000; green: 0x189515)

showLevelup.description: Optional global variable that is set to 0; it can be set to 1 to display the level up message on the HUD

experienceFormula.description: Parameters for experience calculation when using AdvanceSkill

nodes.description: List of nodes in the tree; the first node is required even if the skill has no perks

id.description: Optional ID for referencing this node in links

x.description: Horizontal position of the node (positive direction is left)

y.description: Vertical position of the node (positive direction is up)

links.description: IDs or indices (1-based) of linked perk nodes
